sourceMeaningMnemonic: The radical and the kanji for <kanji>cow</kanji> are exactly the same! That makes it easy to remember, so long as you know your radicals well enough.
meaningInfo: To distinguish this from the "noon" kanji (<ja>午</ja>), try thinking of the bit poking out of the top of this kanji as the cow's head.
readingMnemonic: Have you ever heard of <ja>わ<reading>ぎゅう</reading></ja> beef? That <ja>ぎゅう</ja> is this <ja>ぎゅう</ja>.
readingInfo: I hope you know what <ja>わぎゅう</ja> beef is, otherwise this will be a difficult one to learn.
